team_10.client.object.account

Class Account

  • java.lang.Object
    • team_10.client.object.account.Account
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CertificateOfDeposit, Loan, RealEstate, SavingsAccount, Stock

    public abstract class Account
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Abstract Account class for all account types. All transactions for all types that extend this class are put in the transactions TreeMap.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
